Uses of Class
Catalano.Core.DoubleRange

  • Packages that use DoubleRange 
    Package Description
    Catalano.Core
    The Catalano.Core contains common classes used by other namespaces of the framework and classes, which can be used independently for various purposes.
    Catalano.Math
    The Catalano.Math namespace contains set of math utilities, which are used by other Catalano framework's namespaces or may be used individually.
    Catalano.Math.Geometry
    The Catalano.Math.Geometry namespace contains set of geometry utilities, which are used by other Catalano namespaces or may be used individually.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Convert IntRange to DoubleRange.
      Methods in Catalano.Core with parameters of type DoubleRange 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean DoubleRange.IsOverlapping(DoubleRange range)
      Check if the specified range overlaps with the range.

    • Uses of DoubleRange in Catalano.Math

      Methods in Catalano.Math with parameters of type DoubleRange 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double Tools.Scale(DoubleRange from, DoubleRange to, int x)
      Converts the value x (which is measured in the scale 'from') to another value measured in the scale 'to'.
